add_coti.title: Add COTI Network to MetaMask

step1.title: Step 1: Open MetaMask
step1.text: Click the network dropdown at the top left of MetaMask and select 'Add a custom network'.

step2.title: Step 2: Enter COTI Mainnet Info
step2.text:
Fill in the fields with:

Network Name: COTI
RPC URL: https://mainnet.coti.io/rpc
Chain ID: 2632500
Symbol: COTI
Block Explorer: https://mainnet.cotiscan.io

step3.title: Step 3: Save & Switch
step3.text: Click 'Save'. MetaMask will switch to the COTI network automatically.

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.text: You’ve added the COTI network to MetaMask. You can now bridge tokens or interact with dApps on COTI V2.

step1.title: Step 1: Go to COTI Token Explorer

step2.title: Step 2: Search and Select Your Token
step2.text: Type the name of the token you want to import and click on it to open the token page.

step3.title: Step 3: Copy the Token Address
step3.text: On the token's page, copy the token contract address to your clipboard.

step4.title: Step 4: Open MetaMask
step4.text: Launch your MetaMask extension or mobile app.

step5.title: Step 5: Click the 3 Dots and Choose "Import Tokens"
step5.text: In the Tokens tab, tap the 3 dots icon, then select Import Tokens.

step6.title: Step 6: Select Network & Paste Address
step6.text: Select the COTI network, then paste the token address into the input field.

step7.title: Step 7: Click Next
step7.text: Click the Next button to continue.

step8.title: Step 8: Click Import
step8.text: Click Import to finish adding the token.

step9.title: Step 9: Done!
step9.text: The token should now appear in your MetaMask wallet.
